markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Incredible Aim](/Feats.aspx?ID=4813) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Fighter" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=601" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 146 <sup>2.0</sup>

</column>

---

By spending a moment to focus, you can ensure your attack strikes true. Make a ranged weapon Strike. On this Strike, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to the attack roll and ignore the target’s concealed condition.

<title level="2">Incredible Aim leads to...</title>
[Incredible Ricochet](/Feats.aspx?ID=4837)
name: Incredible Aim
